# Nursing home occupancy rate

```{r}
  instacart %>% 
  group_by(department, order_hour_of_day) %>% 
  tally() %>% 
  filter(n > 3000) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~order_hour_of_day, y = ~n, color = ~department, type = "bar", colors = "viridis")
